name: Suspicious Code Page Switch
description: Detects a code page switch in command line or batch scripts to a rare language
false_positives: Administrative activity (adjust code pages according to your organisation's region)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\chcp.com AND process.command_line:(*\ 936 OR *\ 1258))`
